response.original_title: Hollywood's Pastor: The H.K. Rasbach Story
response.overview: A 2023 documentary about the late Rev. H. K. Rasbach who served as pastor of Hope Lutheran Church in Hollywood, California from 1947 to 1980. Rev. Rasbach saw Cecil B. DeMille’s 1923 silent THE TEN COMMANDMENTS on its original release when he was 10 years old and it inspired him to enter the ministry. This experience culminated in a friendship with Mr. DeMille during the last decade of Mr. DeMille’s life.
response.title: Hollywood's Pastor: The H.K. Rasbach Story

results.name: HOLLYWOOD’S PASTOR The H. K. Rasbach Story (2024) Trailer
